snippet: Texas kept its N.C.A.A. tournament bid hopes alive by beating No. 14 Baylor, 61-59, in overtime, during which seven players were ejected for leaving the bench in a skirmish.
abstract: Virginia beats Syracuse, 59-47, in men's college basketball; other men's and women's college basketball results noted.
lead_paragraph: Texas kept its N.C.A.A. tournament bid hopes alive by beating No. 14 Baylor, 61-59, in overtime, during which seven players were ejected for leaving the bench in a skirmish.

headline.main: Texas Beats No. 14 Baylor; 7 Players Ejected in Overtime
